name: You Should Consider Making A Burger
name_original: You Should Consider Making A Burger
description:
A short and slightly glitchy 1 day experiment to render random burgers turned into a game. You have to drop…er…things into the burger and finish as many as possible, each successive burger requires more things in it to be completed.

Also the burgers are vegan

CONTROLS

[space] Throw things
[f] Finish burger

If you are on a Mac right click Burger.app then open it, otherwise it won't open because it's not signed :(

If you are on Windows let me know if it works!! I haven't tried it yet

Feel free to grab the code at https://github.com/lawwrr/Berger
